title: Phase 1: Adapter infrastructure (Claude Code refactor)
description: Refactor existing Claude Code agent observation into the adapter pattern. Define AgentAdapter interface, AgentEvent schema, InputSender interface. Extract shared packages (otelserver, outputcollector, eventstore). Refactor Claude Code agent to use claude/ adapter with OtelServer + HookHandler + SessionLogCollector. Wire AgentMonitor to consume normalized events. Add unified event store (JSONL per session).
